resources.string: If you like Flipboard, please rate it on the App Store. Thanks!
If you were using an actual device, you’d be rating the app right now.
Would you like to add this section to your Flipboard?
Would you like to add the section “%s” to your Flipboard?
Add as many sources to your Flipboard as you like. Visit the content guide to access them all.
Would you like to update to Flipboard %s?
You must be logged in to %s to %s this item.
You must be logged in to save this item for reading later.
You must be logged in to %s to follow @%s
Log in to a social account to post a new message.
Log in to a social account to share this item.
%s accounts are not enabled. Please try updating to the latest version of Flipboard.
" because there is no Internet connection."
Your message must be under %d characters.
This item will be retweeted on Twitter.

This will completely remove your %s account from Flipboard.
You can always access your content by signing back in.
You’ve deleted this section. Do you want to completely remove your entire %s account from Flipboard?
Tap the title at the top of the screen to view your Google Reader feeds and folders.
An error occurred when trying to add the account. Please try again.
All text and attachments will be removed.

Access all your favorite content, social networks, and settings on any device with a single log-in.
Due to unexpected issues, your Flipboard may not be updating properly. For the latest status, follow @Flipboard on Twitter.

Mute posts by “%s” everywhere in Flipboard?
Changes to muted authors will take effect after you flip away from the current section.
No authors are currently muted. Mute by tapping their image or name and selecting \"Mute\".

Posts from %s on %s will be hidden in Flipboard.

This device does not meet minimum requirements and is not supported by Flipboard. Your results may vary.
Hardware acceleration is not supported by Flipboard. Please turn off hardware graphics acceleration.
